description: This file defines the AppGatewayClient class which provides a wrapper for calling org.rdk.AppGateway.respond via an RPC mechanism. It exposes a synchronous-like method 'respond' that constructs parameters from a consumer context and payload, then invokes the RPC.

classes.name: AppGatewayClient
classes.description: A client class that wraps calls to the AppGateway respond method, providing a simplified interface for invoking remote procedure calls with consumer context and payload.

methods.name: constructor(private readonly invokeRpc: (method: string, params: unknown) => Promise<unknown>)/ constructor
methods.description: Initializes the AppGatewayClient with a function to invoke RPC calls.

methods.name: async respond(consumerCtx: ConsumerContext, payload: unknown): Promise<void> { respond
methods.description: Constructs parameters from the consumer context and payload, then asynchronously calls the 'org.rdk.AppGateway.respond' method via RPC.
